member.name: T:Cheetah.WebApi.Shared.Infrastructure.Services.CheetahOpenSearchClient.CheetahOpenSearchClient
member.summary:
Wrapper around OpenSearch, which introduces logging, authorization, and metrics
CheetahOpenSearchClient is a controller interface for accessing OpenSearch's API. It provides:
Access control
Callers of this class would be able to access only indices on ES that they are authorized to access
Logging
When debug mode is enabled the raw requests to ES are logged in plaintext
Metrics
Automatic metrics for requests done through this client
